column1: The '''Lord of the Rings Roleplaying Adventure Game'''
column2: sometimes called '''The Fellowship of the Ring Adventure Game'''
column3: was a simplified roleplaying game released by [[Decipher Inc.]]. It was an introductory version of the ''[[The Lord of the Rings Roleplaying Game]]''.

column1: The game is based on the more advanced Roleplaying Game
column2: and features pre-built character sheets describing the fellowship.

column1: Battles are fought on hexagonal tactical maps
column2: using cardboard cut-outs of the characters and monsters.

column1: The game begins at the western doors leading into Moria
column2: taking players through several encounters with servants of the Shadow
column3: and culminates with a climactic battle against the dreaded Balrog.
